sections.heading: Short title. This Act may be cited as the War on Terrorism Veterans Act.
sections.text: Short title. This Act may be cited as the War on Terrorism Veterans Act.

sections.heading: War on Terrorism Veterans Memorial
sections.text: A memorial honoring persons who earned (i) the Southwest Asia Service Medal, (ii) the Afghanistan Campaign Medal for service in Operation Enduring Freedom, (iii) the Iraq Campaign Medal for service in Operation Iraqi Freedom, or (iv) the Global War on Terrorism

sections.heading: Effective date. This Act takes effect upon becoming law.
sections.text: Effective date. This Act takes effect upon becoming law.
